channel.title: 508 server error?
channel.description:
'"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_17"' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
:S? I dont get it?

item.title: 508 server error?
item.dc:creator: @jman7 jman7
item.description:
@jman7 wrote:

you need to change the jdk file loaction

item.title: 508 server error?
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Wayne Owner Wayne
item.description:
@Owner_Wayne wrote:

[quote="`Alec, post:1, topic:312966"][quote author=Owner Wayne link=topic=409442.msg3021310#msg3021310 date=1257614441]
‘“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_17”’ is not recognized as an internal or
external command,
operable program or batch file.
Press any key to continue . . .

:S? I dont get it?
[/quote]
In your run.bat file, change “C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_17” to “C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_17”
Provided that jdk1.6.0_17 is your java version.[/quote]
Wont work…My java is in Program files (x86) not program files…It’ll say path not specified.

Read full topic
